Class StrategyContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.behavior.StrategyContext

  • public class StrategyContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class StrategyContext contains the methods to setStartegy as per the player's behaviour and contains methods executeReinforce, executeAttack, executeFortification
